document_data.name: Silverguild Manor
document_data.mainbody: '''Silverguild Manor''' was part of the [[Prosperity House]] complex located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The manor was located in south Zhentil Keep in the eastern section of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] on [[Zhent Avenue]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Silverguild Manor was the home of [[Malvred Silverguild]] and his family. The family was served by a dozen servants and a group of fourteen mercenaries served as his personal guard.
